title: Revenue: Managing a Deposit
body:
Revenue: Managing a Deposit¶

Deposits keeps a record of all payments and refunds that have been made by customers into a bank account of one of a team’s programs.
A deposit is a portion of those payments and refunds, selected when the deposit was created and represented as a net number.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Deposits

  5. Click on a deposit to view the deposit details, an audit trail, and comments

  6. Click Transactions to view the payments and/or refunds included in the deposit

    • Click a hyperlinked payment method to view the associated payment or refund

  7. Click and Download Export to download the deposit to your device
toc: • Revenue: Managing a Deposit
